title: Olaf should be made a energy or health based champion
body: I think Olaf (the champion) should be made an energy or health based champion because he doesn't use magic, he throws axes, and it would fit his kit a lot more. He should use his health because of some sort of berzerker rage. please take these comments in and make him an energy based or health based champion or I will terrorize bronze 5.

Now, that could be interesting.

Olaf could use Rage as a sort-of a stat redistribution mechanic:
- No rage gives him extended defensive stats, but lower offensive (increased health sustain, possibly the resistances)
- Full rage does the exact opposite, giving him good offense but lower defense. (more AS?)

His W could be a toggle to choose between rage generation with autos and rage consumption. His Q could increase his rage on cast, while E decreases it (as he puts all his fury behind the swing).
His ult could possibly instantly put him at full rage and grant the CC immunity. After the ult, your rage will either be reset to zero (if W is in rage-suppressing mode) or stay at full (if in rage-generating mode).

His playstyle would be about carefully balancing his rage, as he could not avoid either building or bleeding rage, and managing the associated boni. Ideally, the boni would be made in such a way that, at 50%, he gets like 1/3 or the maximum possible stat.

Maybe it would also be interesting to deny him the ability to instantly switch from full rage to low rage or vice versa?
I've never played Olaf, but if he worked like this I would absolutely pick him up. This sounds awesomely fun.

Anyway. My biggest issue with Olaf is that he just can not stick to targets. His axes are very easy to avoid. I believe that if the missile speed was increased that could fix his problem. I want to be able to really choose my summoner spells depending on the matchup instead of 100% of the time grabbing ghost. He is one of the few champions that absolutely NEEDS a very specific spell.

He also has a lost sense of identity. Is he a tank? Is he a damage dealer? Regardless of what you take, there are still plenty of champions that do that job better. 

The mobility creep that has recently happened in league has completely destroyed Olaf. That is THE biggest issue overall. Unless this is fixed (I have no idea how it could be, and do not believe it is possible) then Olaf will never be able to win more than the maybe half-a-dozen matchups that he does now.

Rumble can be blocked by minions and the same with kennen. Zed loses a huge part of his all in damage when he does poke with shurikens. When olaf pokes he loses very little all in potential creating a situation where you could sit back and take his poke or go all in and die since throwing a q that does not hit doesn't create the same opening as it does when zed does it. The main problem with olaf as i see it is that his whole kit has to be balanced around his ultimate giving him immunity to cc.
The effect of that is that he can not have a speed up or a dash or anything like that as then he becomes overbearing to low mobility adcs. Maybe more missile speed on his q can do it but i am not sure.

If he was energy, he should be able to use spells when he's out of energy at the cost of health. This would make the most sense since he'd:
-Have more control over his passive.
-Still be gated through costs
-Be more thematically relevant
-Have more clear peaks and lows for damage.
